snippet: Atlantic Media, which owns The National Journal, the political magazine, said it would focus its efforts online and on live events instead.
abstract: National Journal announces it will stop publishing print edition at end of 2015 and will debut updated digital platform in September.
lead_paragraph: Atlantic Media, which owns The National Journal, the political magazine, said it would focus its efforts online and on live events instead.

headline.main: The National Journal to End Print Edition
headline.print_headline: Business Briefing; The National Journal to Stop Publishing a Print Edition
